1298470.name: Project_Escape
1298470.description:
Welcome to Project_Escape! A unique escape-room type experience from an FPS perspective, built from the ground-up with optimization, visuals, challenge and creativity in mind. Including the cross-platform FPS level creator, with over 200 placeable in-game items!


There's plenty of content including 2 Chapters to get you started, each from a different apocalyptic setting and with different types of puzzles. You'll need to maintain your air quality and BPM, adding challenge and pressure to finishing rooms. Finally, you can create your own levels in the creator, with engine-level tools all in the FPS perspective, making it easy for beginners to get started! All exported levels are also playable in other available platforms.


Many thanks for checking out Project_Escape's Steam page, don't forget to have a look at our twitter account, our new feed, or the community hub for constant development updates.
